discussion_comments.commented_code:

discussion_comments.comment_body:
I like the followings personally.

```
all: deps build
  
.PHONY: deps
deps:
    go get -d -v github.com/dustin/go-broadcast/...

.PHONY: build
build: deps
  	go build -o realtime-chat main.go rooms.go template.go
```
